tick_tock.name: Tick-Tock, the Broken Bard
tick_tock.svg: <g class="npc"><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#8af" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="2" /><circle cx="-4" cy="-3" r="2" fill="#000" /><circle cx="4" cy="-3" r="2" fill="#000" /><path d="M-5,5 Q0,10 5,5" stroke="#000" stroke-width="1" fill="none" /><line x1="0" y1="15" x2="0" y2="30" stroke="#8af" stroke-width="3" /></g>
dialogue: One, two. One, two. You're off beat, little soft one. Squishy. Quiet. Disgusting.
They say the Carillon will ring again. But I like the quiet between the ticks. That's where the music lives... in the rests.
Do you know why the dancers broke? They couldn't hear the silence. Only their own rhythm.
You don't reflect. How curious. Are you even real? Or just a pause in the song?

maintenance_automaton.name: Defunct Maintenance Unit
maintenance_automaton.svg: <g class="npc"><rect x="-10" y="-10" width="20" height="20" fill="#555" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" /><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="5" fill="#f00" opacity="0.5" /></g>
dialogue: ER...ROR... SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE OVERDUE BY... [DATA CORRUPTED]... CENTURIES.
DO NOT... STEP ON THE... GRASS. IT IS... SHARP.
I CANNOT... FIX... THE SKY. IT IS... TOO BROKEN.
DETECTING... UNAUTHORIZED FREQUENCY... DO NOT USE THE WHISTLE. IT WAKES... THE OLD ROT.

prime_conductor.name: The Prime Conductor
prime_conductor.svg: <g class="npc"><path d="M0,-20 L-10,0 L10,0 Z" fill="#fff" opacity="0.8" /><circle cx="0" cy="-25" r="8" fill="#fff" opacity="0.9" /><path d="M-15,10 Q0,25 15,10" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.5" /></g>
dialogue: Ah... a little Dampener. Awake at last. The world is out of tune, my child.
The Dissonance Kings have stolen the sheet music. They hoard the resonance in their frozen domains.
Begin with Golgotha. He gorges himself on the past, refusing to let the measure end.
Bring me their resonance. Only then can I restart the Grand Carillon and save us all.
